Articles.Content:
Hey there KSP community,

I'm working on a 3 part cinematic in KSP and just uploaded the first one:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/uTEEFSrxLNY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Enjoy and please tell me what you think about it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-05T20:04:39Z" title="03/05/2015 08:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 5, 2015</time> by Lordherrmann**
